name: azure-pipelines-tasks-terraform
description: This contains the Azure Pipelines tasks for installing and executing terraform commands.

scripts.pack-cli: cd ./tasks/terraform-cli && npm install --include:dev && npm run build && npm run pack
scripts.pack-inst: cd ./tasks/terraform-installer && npm install --include:dev && npm run build && npm run pack
scripts.pack-views: cd ./views/terraform-plan && npm install --include:dev && npm run build && npm run pack
scripts.publish: npm run pack-views && npm run pack-cli && npm run pack-inst

author: Charles Zipp
